SELECT REG.STDNO AS STUDENT_NO , REG.L_ABR_CRSNO AS COURSE_NO , DECODE ( :paramLocale ,'en',REG.CRSLNM ,REG.A_CRSLNM ) AS COURSE_NAME , REG.SECTNO AS SECTION_NO , REG.L_ABR_YRSEM AS YEAR_SEM , DECODE( MOD(REG.SECTNO,10) , 0, REG.CRSCRED, 0 ) AS CREDITS , TO_CHAR( REG.FIRSTWTHDTE, 'DD/MM/YYYY' ) AS FIRST_WITHDRAW_DATE , TO_CHAR( REG.SECONDWTHDTE-1, 'DD/MM/YYYY' ) AS SECOND_WITHDRAW_DATE , TUFEE.FEE AS TUTION_FEE FROM V_STD_CURREG REG , TUITION_FEES_STD TUFEE WHERE REG.L_ABR_CRSNO = TUFEE.L_ABR_CRSNO(+) AND REG.STDNO = TUFEE.STDNO (+) AND REG.SECTCD = TUFEE.SECTCD (+)
AND L_ABR_STDNO = :paramStdId
